original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2261)@</color>凝煉出6朵火焰蓮花，隨機追擊敵人，並對目標以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2261)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2261)@</color> condensed 6 flame lotus flowers, chasing enemies randomly, and using <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2261)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes spell damage to the enemy.
